edu.wpi.first.wpilibj

Class SensorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SendableBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sendable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ADXL345_I2C, ADXL345_SPI, ADXL362, AnalogAccelerometer, AnalogInput, AnalogPotentiometer, AnalogTrigger, BuiltInAccelerometer, Counter, DigitalGlitchFilter, Encoder, GyroBase, InterruptableSensorBase, PowerDistributionPanel, Ultrasonic

    public abstract class SensorBase
extends SendableBase
    Base class for all sensors. Stores most recent status information as well as containing utility functions for checking channels and error processing.
